articles.author: Lauren Gardner, Carmen Paun, Sophie Gardner
articles.title: RFK Jr. says the U.S. should look to Europe on vaccines. That could mean Americans get fewer. - Politico
articles.description: In some cases, Europe has better contained disease, in others it’s let them spread to keep costs down.
articles.content: If [Kennedy] would like to get us universal health care, then maybe we can have a conversation about having the schedule adjusted, Demetre Daskalakis, who led the Centers for Disease Control and Prev… [+15865 chars]
